xccdf:Benchmark.xccdf:title: XCCDF Benchmark That References the Validation Content for the inetd_test
xccdf:Benchmark.xccdf:description: This XCCDF Benchmark references the OVAL Definitions in the validation content for the inetd_test.

xccdf:metadata.dc:contributor: National Institute of Standards and Technology
xccdf:metadata.dc:publisher: National Institute of Standards and Technology
xccdf:metadata.dc:creator: National Institute of Standards and Technology

xccdf:Profile.xccdf:title: XCCDF Profile That References the Validation Content for the inetd_test
xccdf:Profile.xccdf:description: This Profile allows for the tailoring of the validation content for the inetd_test.

metadata.description: Make sure the server_program entity properly supports the equals operation.

criterion.comment: Test to see that the server_program equals /usr/sbin/in.ftpd.
